author: gfukushima
content: I was wondering if there are any specs (or drafts) with the EL changes required at the engine API. I managed to find a fork with some consensus spec (here:https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/blob/db74090c1e8dc1fb2c052bae268e22dc63061e32/specs/verge/beacon-chain.md) but haven't found anything on the EL side. Would somebody be able to point me in the right direction? Thanks!
